title: Sands SkyPark Observation Deck Experiences
blurb: Elevated city views, champagne, chocolates & photo book.
description: Bask in the beauty of golden hour from SkyPark Observation Deck. Enjoy elevated city views, premium champagne & chocolates pairing and a personalised photo book. From intimate sound meditation to high energy sessions, boost your physical and emotional well-being with a series of in-house classes at the Sands SkyPark. Embark on an electric escape in the city after dark. Toggle between three live DJs, groove to your own beat and dance the night away. Experience the race at its most exhilarating with exclusive vantage points, curated indulgences and high-octane spectacle magnified at every turn.

title: SINGAPORE NIGHT RACE at Marina Bay Sands
blurb: Experience the race at its most exhilarating.
description: Experience the race at its most exhilarating with exclusive vantage points, curated indulgences and high-octane spectacle magnified at every turn. Be part of our annual Sands for Singapore Charity Festival where every moment gives back—featuring electrifying live performances, gourmet pop-ups and more that pay homage to all things local in celebration of SG60.

title: Sands for Singapore Charity Festival SG60
blurb: Electrifying live performances, gourmet pop-ups & more!
description: Be part of our annual Sands for Singapore Charity Festival where every moment gives back—featuring electrifying live performances, gourmet pop-ups and more that pay homage to all things local in celebration of SG60. This festival offers a variety of activities suitable for families and individuals alike, with a focus on celebrating Singapore's culture and community. Enjoy live music, sample delicious food, and participate in various interactive experiences designed to bring people together. The festival aims to create a memorable and engaging experience for all attendees, fostering a sense of unity and pride in Singapore's heritage.

title: Silent Disco in the Sky Electric Escape
blurb: Toggle between three live DJs, groove to your own beat!
description: Embark on an electric escape in the city after dark. Toggle between three live DJs, groove to your own beat and dance the night away. This unique experience offers a vibrant and energetic atmosphere, perfect for those looking to unwind and enjoy a night out with friends or loved ones. The silent disco allows you to choose your preferred music genre and dance to your heart's content, creating a personalized and immersive experience. Whether you're a seasoned dancer or just looking to have some fun, Silent Disco in the Sky promises an unforgettable evening of music, dance, and entertainment.

title: Silent Disco in the Sky at Marina Bay Sands
blurb: Electric escape in the city after dark with live DJs.
description: Experience an electric escape in the city after dark. Toggle between three live DJs, groove to your own beat and dance the night away at Marina Bay Sands. Enjoy a unique and elevated party experience with stunning city views. This event is perfect for adults looking for a fun and memorable night out. Dance under the stars and create unforgettable memories with friends. The silent disco offers a personalized music experience with a variety of genres to choose from. Get ready to move and groove to your own beat in the sky.

title: Sunset in the Sky at Marina Bay Sands
blurb: Bask in the beauty of golden hour from SkyPark.
description: Enjoy elevated city views, premium champagne & chocolates pairing and a personalised photo book at Marina Bay Sands SkyPark Observation Deck. Bask in the beauty of golden hour with a luxurious experience. Perfect for couples and those seeking a sophisticated and romantic evening. Capture the stunning sunset views and create lasting memories with a personalized photo book. Indulge in premium champagne and chocolates while enjoying the breathtaking scenery. This is an unforgettable experience for those who appreciate the finer things in life. A perfect way to celebrate a special occasion or simply enjoy a magical evening.

title: Sunset in the Sky at Sands SkyPark Observation
blurb: Enjoy golden hour views, champagne & chocolates.
description: Bask in the beauty of golden hour from SkyPark Observation Deck. Enjoy elevated city views, premium champagne & chocolates pairing and a personalised photo book. This experience offers a unique way to appreciate the Singapore skyline while indulging in luxury treats. Perfect for couples or anyone seeking a memorable evening. The SkyPark Observation Deck provides stunning panoramic views, making it an ideal spot for capturing breathtaking photos and creating lasting memories. Enjoy the sunset in style with this exclusive package.

title: Mind & Body Sessions at Sands SkyPark
blurb: Boost well-being with in-house classes at SkyPark.
description: From intimate sound meditation to high energy sessions, boost your physical and emotional well-being with a series of in-house classes at the Sands SkyPark. These sessions are designed to cater to various fitness levels and preferences, offering a holistic approach to wellness. Whether you're looking to relax and unwind or invigorate your body and mind, there's a class for you. The Sands SkyPark provides a serene and inspiring environment for these activities, enhancing the overall experience. Join us and discover a new level of well-being.

title: Sands SkyPark: Mind & Body Connection Activities
blurb: Boost well-being with classes at Sands SkyPark.
description: Enhance your physical and emotional well-being with a series of in-house classes at the Sands SkyPark. From intimate sound meditation sessions to high-energy workouts, there's something for everyone looking to connect mind and body. Suitable for adults and older teens interested in wellness activities. The classes are designed to promote relaxation, fitness, and overall well-being in a serene environment. Enjoy panoramic views while you rejuvenate your senses. A perfect escape for those seeking balance and harmony in their lives. The Sands SkyPark provides a unique setting for these enriching experiences.

title: The Shoppes: Grand Colonnade Celebrations
blurb: Celebrate bold beginnings at The Shoppes.
description: Experience the vibrant atmosphere of The Shoppes at Marina Bay Sands, particularly the Grand Colonnade, during special celebrations. Enjoy festive decorations, cultural performances, and unique shopping experiences. This location offers a variety of retail and dining options suitable for families and visitors of all ages. The Grand Colonnade provides a spacious and visually stunning environment for events and gatherings, making it a memorable destination for celebrating special occasions. The Shoppes provide a family-friendly environment with a wide array of shops and restaurants.

title: SkyPark Observation Deck at Marina Bay Sands
blurb: Panoramic views of Singapore's cityscape and beyond.
description: Behold panoramic views stretching from the sprawling cityscape to Gardens by the Bay and the Singapore Strait. The SkyPark Observation Deck offers an unparalleled vantage point to admire Singapore's iconic landmarks and stunning skyline. Perfect for families and visitors of all ages, it's an unforgettable experience to witness the beauty of Singapore from above. Enjoy breathtaking sunsets and capture memorable moments with your loved ones. The observation deck provides a safe and accessible environment for everyone to enjoy the spectacular scenery. A must-visit attraction for tourists and locals alike.
full_address: WANDER INTO WONDER SKYPARK OBSERVATION DECK Behold panoramic views stretching from the sprawling cityscape to Gardens by the Bay and the Singapore Strait

title: ArtScience Museum at Marina Bay Sands
blurb: Explore art, science, technology, and culture.
description: Explore the intersection between art, science, technology and culture at this local cultural institution. The ArtScience Museum offers a dynamic and engaging experience for visitors of all ages. Discover innovative exhibitions that blend creativity and knowledge, sparking curiosity and inspiring new perspectives. Perfect for families, students, and art enthusiasts, the museum provides a unique learning environment. Immerse yourself in interactive displays and thought-provoking installations that explore the wonders of the world. A must-visit destination for those seeking intellectual stimulation and artistic inspiration. The museum's architecture is also a sight to behold.
full_address: WANDER INTO WONDER SKYPARK OBSERVATION DECK Behold panoramic views stretching from the sprawling cityscape to Gardens by the Bay and the Singapore Strait

title: Digital Light Canvas by teamLab at Marina Bay
blurb: Interactive natural paradise by teamLab.
description: Journey into an imaginative, interactive natural paradise bursting with exotic flora and fauna, presented in collaboration with renowned art collective teamLab. The Digital Light Canvas offers a mesmerizing experience for visitors of all ages. Immerse yourself in a world of vibrant colors and dynamic visuals, where art and technology seamlessly blend together. Perfect for families, couples, and art enthusiasts, this attraction provides a unique and unforgettable sensory experience. Explore the wonders of nature in a digital realm, where every step brings new surprises and discoveries. A must-see destination for those seeking a captivating and immersive art experience.
full_address: WANDER INTO WONDER SKYPARK OBSERVATION DECK Behold panoramic views stretching from the sprawling cityscape to Gardens by the Bay and the Singapore Strait

title: Sampan Rides at Marina Bay Sands
blurb: Glide along the canal in a charming Sampan boat.
description: Glide along the canal in a charming Sampan boat inspired by those that once filled the Singapore River. Sampan Rides offer a unique and relaxing way to experience the beauty of Marina Bay Sands. Perfect for families, couples, and visitors of all ages, this attraction provides a tranquil escape from the hustle and bustle of the city. Enjoy the gentle sway of the boat as you admire the stunning architecture and vibrant atmosphere. Capture memorable moments with your loved ones as you cruise along the canal. A must-try experience for those seeking a peaceful and scenic adventure.
full_address: WANDER INTO WONDER SKYPARK OBSERVATION DECK Behold panoramic views stretching from the sprawling cityscape to Gardens by the Bay and the Singapore Strait

title: Spectra Light & Water Show at Marina Bay Sands
blurb: Outdoor light and water show, free nightly.
description: An outdoor light and water extravaganza evoking Singapore’s journey to becoming a cosmopolitan city. Shows nightly for free at the Event Plaza. Spectra is a mesmerizing display of lights, music, and water effects that tells the story of Singapore's rich history and vibrant culture. Perfect for families, couples, and visitors of all ages, this free show is a must-see attraction. Experience the magic as the water dances to the rhythm of the music, creating a captivating and unforgettable spectacle. Gather around the Event Plaza and witness the beauty of Spectra under the stars. A truly enchanting experience for everyone.
full_address: WANDER INTO WONDER SKYPARK OBSERVATION DECK Behold panoramic views stretching from the sprawling cityscape to Gardens by the Bay and the Singapore Strait

title: DIGITAL LIGHT CANVAS BY TEAMLAB
blurb: Imaginative, interactive natural paradise.
description: Journey into an imaginative, interactive natural paradise bursting with exotic flora and fauna, presented in collaboration with renowned art collective teamLab. Journey into an imaginative, interactive natural paradise bursting with exotic flora and fauna, presented in collaboration with renowned art collective teamLab. This digital art installation offers a unique sensory experience for visitors of all ages. Explore the vibrant ecosystem and interact with the digital creatures that inhabit this mesmerizing world. A perfect blend of art and technology, the Digital Light Canvas provides an immersive and unforgettable adventure for families and art enthusiasts alike.

title: SAMPAN RIDES
blurb: Glide along the canal in a charming Sampan boat.
description: Experience a unique ride along the canal in a charming Sampan boat, inspired by the traditional boats that once graced the Singapore River. Enjoy the sights and sounds of the Shoppes at Marina Bay Sands from a different perspective as you gently glide along the water. This family-friendly activity offers a relaxing and memorable experience for all ages. Take a break from shopping and immerse yourself in the tranquil atmosphere of the canal. Perfect for families looking for a leisurely activity.

title: SPECTRA
blurb: An outdoor light and water extravaganza.
description: SPECTRA is a mesmerizing outdoor light and water show that tells the story of Singapore's journey to becoming a cosmopolitan city. This free nightly show at the Event Plaza combines music, lights, and water fountains to create a stunning visual spectacle. The show is family-friendly and suitable for all ages. Gather around the waterfront and enjoy this captivating performance that celebrates Singapore's rich history and vibrant culture. A perfect evening activity for families and visitors alike.

title: SPECTRA Light and Water Show at Marina Bay Sands
blurb: A free outdoor light and water show every night.
description: SPECTRA is an outdoor light and water extravaganza that tells the story of Singapore's journey to becoming a cosmopolitan city. The show features dancing fountains, colorful visual projections, and advanced laser technology, all set to an original soundtrack. It's a captivating experience for all ages and a great way to end an evening at Marina Bay Sands. The show is family-friendly and accessible to all. The Event Plaza provides ample viewing space, and the show's themes are engaging for both children and adults. The show is free for all to enjoy.

title: Shows & Concerts at Marina Bay Sands Theatre
blurb: Award-winning musicals and star-studded concerts.
description: Experience award-winning Broadway musicals and acclaimed performances at Sands Theatre, along with star-studded concerts and gala premieres. Elevate your evening with a Show & Dine package, featuring curated menus from signature restaurants for the perfect prelude to the stage. Enjoy a diverse range of entertainment suitable for families and adults alike, from theatrical productions to live music events. The venue offers comfortable seating and state-of-the-art sound systems, ensuring an unforgettable experience for all attendees. Family-friendly shows are regularly featured, making it a great option for a night out with the kids.

title: Sands Theatre: Broadway Musicals and Performances
blurb: Exclusive shows and events to entertain and delight.
description: Experience award-winning Broadway musicals and highly acclaimed performances at Sands Theatre. Enjoy star-studded concerts and gala premieres. Elevate your evening with a Show & Dine package, featuring curated menus from our signature restaurants for the perfect prelude to the stage. Perfect for families and adults looking for high-quality entertainment. The theatre offers a variety of shows suitable for different age groups. Check the specific show details for age recommendations. Enjoy a memorable evening with world-class performances and dining options.

title: Gardens by the Bay: A Horticultural Wonderland
blurb: Explore stunning gardens and futuristic Supertrees.
description: Gardens by the Bay is a horticultural wonderland that showcases the best of garden and floral artistry for visitors of all ages. Explore diverse plant species, themed gardens, and the iconic Supertrees. The Cloud Forest and Flower Dome offer unique indoor experiences, while the OCBC Skyway provides stunning views of the city skyline. Perfect for families, nature lovers, and anyone seeking a tranquil escape in the heart of Singapore. Enjoy leisurely strolls, educational exhibits, and breathtaking displays of nature's beauty. The gardens provide a family-friendly environment with ample space for kids to explore and play.

title: ArtScience Museum: Where Art Meets Science
blurb: Discover interactive exhibits at the iconic lotus-shaped museum.
description: The ArtScience Museum is an iconic lotus-shaped building that bridges the gap between art and science. Explore interactive exhibits that blend creativity and innovation, offering a unique experience for visitors of all ages. From digital art installations to scientific explorations, the museum provides a stimulating environment for learning and discovery. Perfect for families, art enthusiasts, and anyone curious about the intersection of art and science. Engage with cutting-edge technology, explore thought-provoking exhibitions, and discover the wonders of the world around us. The museum offers a family-friendly environment with activities and exhibits designed to engage children and adults alike.

title: Gardens by the Bay: A unique horticultural oasis
blurb: Stroll through stunning Supertrees and diverse gardens.
description: Explore the iconic Supertrees, marvel at the diverse plant collections in the cooled conservatories, and enjoy the serene beauty of the themed gardens. Gardens by the Bay offers a captivating experience for visitors of all ages, with its blend of nature, technology, and design. Perfect for families seeking a memorable outing, the gardens provide ample opportunities for exploration, education, and relaxation. Discover the wonders of horticulture and immerse yourself in a world of natural beauty at Gardens by the Bay. Enjoy the vibrant colors and unique landscapes.
